abstract: Marcelo Calero, former Brazilian cabinet minister, accuses Pres Michel Temer of exerting pressure to help political ally Geddel Vieira Lima in property deal; charge leads to calls for Temer's impeachment and contributes to growing corruption scandal in top levels of Brazil's fledgling government.

headline.print_headline: New Graft Scandal Shakes Brazilian Leader’s Fledgling Government
headline.main: Brazil’s President, Michel Temer, Embroiled in New Corruption Scandal

snippet: Marcelo Calero, a former culture minister, said Mr. Temer had pressured him on behalf of a top ally. Critics are demanding the president’s impeachment....
lead_paragraph: Marcelo Calero, a former culture minister, said Mr. Temer had pressured him on behalf of a top ally. Critics are demanding the president’s impeachment.
